QuoteText: I Isn't it wonderful that you and Iranian conservatives have so much in common?
ResponseText: Actually, I see this argument presented quite often. It's never bothered me. In fact I do find a very few admirable traits of the enemy - radical Islamists. They seem to be very committed to family, they have a serious conviction to their cause (spreading radical Islam throughout the world, and this is why they must be TAKEN seriously), also they certainly are not politically correct pistol whipped into submission by their own press.
